attributes.action: Offer people of the UK an opportunity to decide on what to do to fight COVID.
attributes.additional_details: Too many people are fed up and unhappy with decisions being made. This gives them a chance to support what they feel should happen .
attributes.background: Let the people decide what to do to fight COVID . We are becoming a divided society. Should we really do what is being suggested for COVID - we don’t for FLU.
